title: elo boosting
body: is elo boosting against the rules? i mean there was this 30-3 annie in my last game who kept going around getting pentakills and advertising "$4 per game/$20 per division" and giving out his skype name. i reported him/her.

replies.body:
You just screwed over the idiot who probably payed 20$ of his parent's money that was meant to be his bus money into losing his acc.

Good job!
